title: Ride booking and taxi service
content:
# Uber App Guide

## Navigation
- **Bottom Navigation Bar**: Switch between **Home** (ride options), **Services** (all offerings), **Activity** (past/current trips), **Offers** (promotions), and **Account** (settings).
- **Service Grid**: The Home screen provides quick buttons for **Ride**, **Auto**, **Bike**, **Reserve**, **Intercity**, and **Send Items**.
- **Safety**: A dedicated **Safety features** button is often visible on the main dashboard for quick access to emergency tools.

## Search
- **Destination Search**: Tap the large **"Search Destinations"** bar at the top of the Home screen to begin booking.
- **Location Inputs**: Enter your **Pickup** location (top field) and **"Where to?"** (destination) text field. You can also select **"Set location on map"** for precision.
- **Saved Places**: The search screen lists **"Saved places"** and recent destinations (like "Patna Junction") for one-tap access.

## Common Actions
- **Book a Ride**: After entering a destination, select a vehicle type (e.g., **Uber Go**, **Go Sedan**, **Premier**) from the list and tap the large **Choose [Vehicle Type]** button.
- **Schedule for Later**: Use the **"Later"** button (clock icon) in the search bar or the **Reserve** tile to book a ride in advance.
- **Change Payment**: Tap the payment method displayed above the confirmation button (e.g., **"Cash"**) to switch between Cash, UPI, or Cards.
- **Book for Others**: Tap the **"For me"** dropdown at the top of the planning screen to switch profiles and book a ride for a friend or family member.

## Tips
- **Discounts**: Look for red tags (e.g., **"60%"**) on service icons or green banners like **"Up to 60% off on first 5"** to find the best deals.
- **Price Comparison**: The ride selection screen clearly lists the price (e.g., **â‚¹925.72**) and drop-off time for each vehicle tier, helping you balance cost vs. comfort.
- **Intercity**: Use the **Intercity** icon on the home screen for traveling between cities rather than just within town.
